parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal.amount
parameters.description: Amount of regular transaction from the SMA.

parameters.name: RegularWithdrawal.frequency
parameters.description: Frequency of the regular transaction from the SMA.

parameters.name: RegularContribution.amount
parameters.description: Amount of regular cash contributions to the SMA.

parameters.name: BankAccounts.usages
parameters.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

parameters.description: Amount of regular cash contributions to the SMA.

parameters.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

parameters.name: AdviserId
parameters.description: The adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: OwnerAdviserId
parameters.description: The owner adviser ID to create the application under.

parameters.name: Applicants
parameters.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.tradingName
parameters.description: Trading name of the corporate applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.identifications
parameters.description: Array of TFN / TIN / ABN / NIN

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.identifications.missingReason
parameters.description: If there is no identification of applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.identifications.missingReasonText
parameters.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.contactIsSignatory
parameters.description: Whether the conact is a signatory on the account.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.contact.nationalIdentifier.countryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.contact.nationalIdentifier.noNationalIdentifier
parameters.description: If applicant does not hold a national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.signatories.nationalIdentifier.countryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.signatories.nationalIdentifier.noNationalIdentifier
parameters.description: If applicant does not hold a national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.countryOfIncorporation
parameters.description: Country of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Applicants.corporateDetails.dateOfIncorporation
parameters.description: Date of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.identifications.missingReason
parameters.description: If there is no identification of applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.identifications.missingReasonText
parameters.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.title
parameters.description: Title: Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Doctor, Lady, Prof and Sir.

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.dateOfBirth
parameters.description: Date of birth of the applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.phone
parameters.description: Primary contact number of the applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.nationalIdentifier.countryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.individualDetails.nationalIdentifier.noNationalIdentifier
parameters.description: If applicant does not hold a national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.signatories.nationalIdentifier.countryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.signatories.nationalIdentifier.noNationalIdentifier
parameters.description: If applicant does not hold a national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.tradingName
parameters.description: Trading name of the corporate applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.identifications
parameters.description: Array of TFN / TIN / ABN / NIN

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.identifications.missingReason
parameters.description: If there is no identification of applicant.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.identifications.missingReasonText
parameters.description: Reason identification of applicant is missing.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.contactIsSignatory
parameters.description: Whether the conact is a signatory on the account.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.contact.nationalIdentifier.countryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.contact.nationalIdentifier.noNationalIdentifier
parameters.description: If applicant does not hold a national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.signatories.nationalIdentifier.countryOfNationality
parameters.description: The applicant's country of national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.signatories.nationalIdentifier.noNationalIdentifier
parameters.description: If applicant does not hold a national identifier.

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.countryOfIncorporation
parameters.description: Country of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Applicants.trustDetails.corporateTrustees.dateOfIncorporation
parameters.description: Date of Incorporation of the Company

parameters.name: Accounts
parameters.description: Array of accounts to be opened with the application. Must be linked to an included applicant.

parameters.name: Accounts.accountType
parameters.description:
AU account types: Company = 13, Individual = 14
UK account types: Isa = 0, Gia = 1, OffshoreBond = 2, Qrops = 3, Rats = 4, Sipp = 5, PraemiumRetirementAccount = 6, Pera = 7, PersonalPension = 8, GroupSipp = 9, Ssas = 10, Jisa = 11, OnshoreBond = 12.

parameters.name: Accounts.bankAccounts.usages
parameters.description: This allows you to define a regular cash addition or withdrawal from the SMA or SuperSMA.

parameters.name: Accounts.exclusions.security.code
parameters.description: The security code of the security.

parameters.name: Accounts.exclusions.security.exchange
parameters.description: The exchange code of the security.

parameters.name: Accounts.trustOrFundDetails.abn
parameters.description: ABN of the Super Fund (rather than the corporate trustee) for corporate applicants.

parameters.name: Accounts.regularContribution
parameters.description: Regular cash contributions to the SMA.

parameters.name: Accounts.regularWithdrawal
parameters.description: Regular cash withdrawals from the SMA.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID provided by Praemium.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret provided by Praemium.

code.description: The security code of the security.

exchange.description: The exchange code of the security.

abn.description: ABN of the Super Fund (rather than the corporate trustee) for corporate applicants.

accountType.description:
AU account types: Company = 13, Individual = 14
UK account types: Isa = 0, Gia = 1, OffshoreBond = 2, Qrops = 3, Rats = 4, Sipp = 5, PraemiumRetirementAccount = 6, Pera = 7, PersonalPension = 8, GroupSipp = 9, Ssas = 10, Jisa = 11, OnshoreBond = 12.

applicants.description: Objects containing the applicant data. There must be at least one applicant for the request to succeed. The array of objects may contain a mix of Individual and Corporate applicants.
